original_text: He dealt treacherously with our people and oppressed our ancestors by forcing them to throw out their newborn babies so that they would die.
korean_text: 그가 우리 족속에게 교활한 방법을 써서 조상들을 괴롭게 하여 그 어린 아이들을 내버려 살지 못하게 하려 할새

sentences.original_text: He dealt treacherously with our people
by forcing them to throw out their newborn babies
